siteMetadata.title: Trafikito - monitor output of any command
siteMetadata.author: Lukas Liesis

markdownRemark.excerpt: When you try to make changes, then try to save it but you don’t have the required role to save changes, Trafikito shows messages that your role is insufficient.
markdownRemark.html: When you try to make changes, then try to save it but you don’t have the required role to save changes, Trafikito shows messages that your role is insufficient.
